Reviews.Title: TFT display, poor sound but good!
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: This screen display isn't going to win any awards, but at this price is worth it!! The sound sucks but if you have your own sound system then it won't matter. Its a tft display so don't expect a high gloss display. It also has a poor viewing angle but head on it looks wonderful. Dark blacks rich color when viewed head on. It's once again TFT so it has a limited viewing angle but when hooked up to a computer via hdmi it makes a wonderful 1080 display. Text is clearly defined being tft (the perk).So to recap. Bad sound, limited viewing angle. Good colors and blacks, nice design, large screen, great as a computer monitor with solid text reproduction. For the sub 300 price its hard to beat!4/27/13 - Still running strong with lots of use.10/29/2013 - Still running strong with lots of use.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Wh0M3
Reviews.Content: I jumped on this deal when I saw it.  The same TV was marked down to the original price here on a different site.  Setting up the TV was easy, the menu is easy to work with.  My only hang up with this is it takes some time to power on and power off.  When I started using the TV I would end up hitting the power button a few times because I didn't think it took the first time.  Then I'd watch it respond and wonder if it was coming on or off.  Turning it off is a bit quicker with a popup that tells you it's shutting down.  (thanks)  I switched over to a universal remote and it seems to work better at turning it on.  I know the universal remote is better at sending signals to devices.Over all I think it's a great TV. I wouldn't mind having another one in a different room.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, but obviously not the best
Reviews.Author: Craig Lloyd
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV on sale, and it was worth the money. It's a budget display so don't expect anything amazing. It'll take a bit of tuning to calibrate the colors to your liking. The sound is absolutely horrible, so I suggest getting a sound system if you don't have one already. Sadly, this TV doesn't have RCA Audio Out, but it does have digital coaxial S/PDIF output.Overall, if you're on a budget, you can't really go wrong with this TV. Just make sure it has all the ports you need and such before you buy it.

Reviews.Title: Worst TV ever!
Reviews.Author: itsspook
Reviews.Content: Got my TV. Set it up just fine. I was super excited because I've never had a TV this big before. The picture was good. Sound was good enough for me. I went to sleep happy with my purchase. The next day when I got home, I tried to turn on the tv and it wouldn't turn on. The blue light on the TV was still on so there was no indicator that power was lost. I tried everything that I could think of to make it turn on and I got nothing. It was completely disappointing. I then looked into the TV further and saw that others even with other types of Coby TVs people have had the same problems. I would not suggest wasting your own time and resources on this TV or this brand.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: D. hamilton "humpty"
Reviews.Content: picture is good,setup was easy. the only thing is the sound... i put this in my bedroom so i have no problem hearing but if you were going to stick this in living room you would need to get speakers.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: JD "S0ULBENDER"
Reviews.Content: Wow, I took a chance with this beacause the price was so low.. OMG am i happy.. Beautiful Picture,Jet black bezzel,great value.Bought it for my daughters room she is very very pleased with it,,

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Sheryl
Reviews.Content: Easy set-up, lots of options for hooking to DVD, DVR, remote feels cheap, but works.Time will tell if it is as cheap as it costs.Compared to the old dinosaur TV I had before, I'm thrilled.Affordable!

Reviews.Title: good TV
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: The screen is not perfect, but still very good at this price. Its sound system seems to be ok, too.

Reviews.Title: Exactly What I Wanted
Reviews.Author: Ivanna W.
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my bedroom mainly for gaming and streaming from my PC. The picture is perfect, HD, the characters on Assassins Creed 3 multiplayer are ridiculously vivid and detailed. Netflix is clear. Fiddle with the controls for a few minutes you'll get it. I may buy a sound bar sometime next month but I doubt it, the sound is great for my bedroom.It is huge compared to my brothers 32 inch so there's that, my only complaint is that crazy bright light, but a little electrical tape took care of that.

Reviews.Title: buyer be ware
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Beanie"
Reviews.Content: The speakers on this unit garbage. I had to spend another $75 for a sound bar. The salesman that sold me the sound bar said it was because they are making tv's thinner and that makes for poor speaker/sound quality. I think he was selling me a bunch of bull. I was determined to leave the store with a sound bar, he didn't have to make stuff up to sell me the item. The TV is slow to turn on, the sound from the cable box comes on a little bit before the screen comes on. All in all (so far) it has been a good upgrade from the monstrosity of a plasma tv that we had...but then I have only had it 4 days.

Reviews.Title: coby TFTV3925 39"
Reviews.Author: goatt
Reviews.Content: Easy ordering online Through amizon.com delivery was earlier then expected easy install no damadge in packaging has a great picture would recommend the purchase to anyone awesome price can't ask for a better deal.

Reviews.Title: Now free 1-day Air. 12/19/2012
Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: Amazon is Overnight 1-day Air Mailing these now, due to the number of broken screens. I chose super saver and it was here at 10AM the next morning lol. Can't beat that!The screen was just fine when mine arrived and it's a pretty awesome TV. I think I read someone stating that the view angle sucks. That couldn't be more further from the truth. If you can see the screen, you can see a picture. There is no "black" shading to it. I was watching TV in my apartment while cooking in the kitchen and the angle was extreme because it faces a side wall. View angle is better than most. It also pivots on the base that comes with it.As far as options on the TV goes, it's pretty standard. One flaw it has is that if you run an external display like a laptop via HDMI (computer screen on TV), it will play the picture and the sound on the TV, but it won't transfer that sound to a Home Theatre System. You have to run a 3.5mm cord from the headphone jack to the Theatre system. Not a biggy as you already have the HDMI cord going across the room, but it would be nice to see upgraded circuitry. The TV speakers suck.It's a nice TV, and it's a TFTV, which works well with computer inputs. View angle is awesome and it's a pretty light tv at 25ish lbs.You won't regret buying this.

Reviews.Title: Bomb deal
Reviews.Author: Mike Valdez
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews before I made my purchase.  Its true that the remote has a split second delay when you use it but at this price who cares.  The volume levels were fine, I even find it too loud at times.  I think its a great TV for the price.  Picture quality is great!  If you're putting this tv in your bedroom then you're getting a great deal.  I

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: Deelicious
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV as a gift for my children for Christmas. The TV worked fine until one day we were watching TV and it just turned off. I attempted to turn it back on and it never came back on. I called and inquired about the warranty; I was placed on hold for over an hour and then transferred back to the ivr. In the future I will be more careful how I spend my money

Reviews.Title: Don't buy a Coby
Reviews.Author: msl
Reviews.Content: The TV does not work well. It's a cheap tv for a reason and its not worth the $20-100 savings from not getting  a good brand.  The remote does not turn the tv on fast - the delay is several seconds - several long seconds.  As a result it is hard to turn on the television because you do not know if you hit the on or if its just the Coby acting up.  As  a result you have to turn on the television three or four times before you succeed.  Changing channels is the same. The delay is extremely frustrating.  TV and Sound are ok.  Sound is a bit muffled but not bad for a cheap tv.  There is a blue light that is lit whenever the television is powered off.  It is extremeely bright.  Therefore, if you want this television in the bedroom or somewhere where lights are not wanted, I would not recommend it.  The light illuminates the whole bedroom and is a bright spotlight.  I have bought cheap televisions before, Insignia and Oliva.  Both are far superior to this piece of crap.  This cannot come close to comparing to an LG or Panasonic (my other televisons).

Reviews.Title: Ignore the others, it's great!
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I got this TV for myself after my beloved RCR TV died after about 7 years of always being on.  I think this TV will repeat the life of the other one and possibly last longer!The picture is amazing for the price you pay.  It is true 1080p and so far on my games they are a lot more detailed than on my previous 720p screen.  And 39 inches, how could you go wrong?The sound quality isn't as bad as others say.  There really isn't bass on the stock speakers, but you don't get that with any real on-brand televisions either.  The treble is good and there is no sound distortion from what I can tell so far.  I've had this TV for about a week and have had no trouble out of it at all.  It arrived one day ahead of time which I am very surprised with.It has many different ports in the back for all of your devices, and three HDMI ports which is very useful.  It also has a digital audio out port in case you have a speaker system like me which is definitely an added bonus.Overall, I'm very satisfied and am glad I purchased this TV.  I also got the 3 year warranty with it and hopefully will never have to use it.  A great buy and definitely worth the money!

Reviews.Title: enjoy this
Reviews.Author: judy l rawlinson
Reviews.Content: good color .easy set up,  meets all of the expectations that i had for it, I would tell everyone to buy one,

Reviews.Title: Good for the money.
Reviews.Author: Emo
Reviews.Content: It is not the greatest TV, but it works perfect and it is a good deal for the money. I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Price ($250 on Cyber Monday)
Reviews.Author: Daniel Stravens "Philosopher"
Reviews.Content: Least expensive TV with all the features and reliability of the higher-end brands. This is a win-win product that you should buy.

Reviews.Title: Broken with no way to exchange.
Reviews.Author: Kristy Geloso
Reviews.Content: The low rating is because I received the item with damage (crack in the lcd panel). It would have been fine to return for a replacement but when I went to return it there were no options except for a refund. When there is not any way to exchange like for like Amazon should offer a comparable replacement. I was seriously bummed, it was for my wife's birthday. Kind of ruined the whole experience for her. The TV on the other hand is great for the price that I bought it at. The picture is nice. The sound is just ok, pretty common for low cost flat screens. The sound is not as bad as other reviewers have said though. I would definitely recommend this TV, just would not recommend having it shipped.

Reviews.Title: Ladies: Buy this for your men!
Reviews.Author: Michelle Lynn
Reviews.Content: So, my Christmas gifts are usually pretty amazing. PS3, matching dual monitors for his computer, etc, etc. This year, after hearing him complain about not having an awesome TV in our bedroom, I bought this and a swivel mount. He opened it and (he is one of those techy nerdy types) HE LOVED IT! Here are some exact quotes:"3 HDMI? Awesome!""This is so lightweight!""This makes our room look b@d@$$!""You're seriously the best wife ever."SO.... although I was worried about picking a TV without him there, I succeeded in continuing my string of amazing Christmas gifts!The ONLY thing is that it DID NOT come with an HDMI cable. Luckily, I thought ahead and bought a couple. I would also recommend that in the future, you purchase a small sound system to improve the sound quality. We have no problems, but we have a smaller bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Decent budget-priced flatscreen
Reviews.Author: Zack Davisson
Reviews.Content: Flatscreens and HDTVs have plunged in price far enough that they are no longer rich people's toys but are now standard-issue.  My experience has been with the budget models--in the $3-400 price range and the under 40-inch screens. I currently own the "Coby TFTV3925," and the similarly priced TCL L40FHDF12TA and "TCL L32HDF11TA" (now discontinued).The Coby is easy to set up, and once you free it from its box it is pretty much plug-and-play. I fiddled around with the features for awhile. In my experience, all of the features are fun, but they rarely do anything to enhance the viewing experience. Just little technological toys to play with.All of these TVs are pretty similar in picture quality. The Coby is a bit larger--39 inches vs. 32 inches for my other TVs. The extra size isn't all that noticeable, but every inch counts in TV size, right?  I used by BluRay player and compared the visual quality of the three TVs. To my untrained and non-expert eye I didn't notice any differences. The "TCL 12TZ" boasts "enhanced image quality" but I am putting that down to marketing.  The all look great, with a nice, sharp picture, and the Coby gets the edge for having a larger size.Sound is where the Coby takes a hit.  It has noticeably lower sound quality than either of the TCL models.  To be honest, none of them have great sound--this isn't usually a problem as I have a 5.1 surround sound system so I rarely rely on the TV speakers, but if you don't have any stereo back-up you are going to find the Coby hard to listen too. I think you are going to want to use some of the money you save to buy some back-up speakers.The Coby is cheaper than either of the TLC models, and that is huge. Honestly, I am willing to sacrifice a little quality for a bargain, and I think you get that with the Coby. To me, the picture is more important than the sound, and on that the Coby delivers. Plus, I like the few extra inches you can buy for cheaper than either of the TCL TVs.After the comparison, the Coby took the honored spot in the living room, while the TLC 11TA got demoted to the guest room. This isn't a perfect TV. If you are expecting to get high-end quality for low-end price, then you are going to be disappointed. But if you are realistic about what you are buying, I think you will be perfectly happy. You would be hard pressed to find another TV that gives you as much value for your dollar. And inches. Can't forget about those inches.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Robert Scott Masingill "Scott"
Reviews.Content: TV is great with the exception that there is no audio out jack, so difficult to connect to a external speaker system.

Reviews.Title: tv quit working properly after 100 days
Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: this tv is 39 inches one inch short of qualifying for the 1 year warranty; and quit working ten days after the 90 day warranty expired... on the plus side it is the cheapest tv of this size and worked for three month. the picture (when it worked) was also just okay, not great or terrible.

Reviews.Title: Terrible sound, and only allows mono audio selection.
Reviews.Author: Jon Rosemeyer
Reviews.Content: The sound is terrible, and in the audio menu I cannot get it to select stereo. I would return if it I had not taken it my second home out of the country.

Reviews.Title: Great picture .... tinny sound
Reviews.Author: KimO
Reviews.Content: This TV design/look is modern.  The picture, especially with the HD cable, is great!As a matter of fact, I really like everything about it EXCEPT the sound.This was a Christmas gift to myself.  I initially had it in an old style entertainment center.  So, when the sound wasn't coming out loud enough (even at top volume), I attributed it to the speakers (which are on the sides) being blocked in.So, I finally purchased a new TV stand; one that allowed the TV to be set on top - speakers no longer encased/blocked.It really made no difference.Ultimately, I purchased a sound bar.This is my first HDTV, so I can't compare to any other personal similar experiences.  But, from acquaintances and even sampling them in stores, I truly feel the sound quality is below average on this unit.

Reviews.Title: really likey
Reviews.Author: Ladi J
Reviews.Content: When i received the tv i was excited. installation was easy and the picture is really nice and the price was right.

Reviews.Title: Great TV For Price
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because I thought it had the greatest mix of value vs price and I believe I was right. The TV looks pretty good, about what I was expecting, the sound is pretty good, about what I was expecting as well. It has plenty of inputs and works great.I had some issues initially with the TV turning itself off after about an hour but I think that was because for some reason the factory settings had it in sleep mode for 1 hour, but it hasn't done anything like that since I bought it and I've had it for about 4 months now. My only other complaint with the TV is that it can be tricky to turn on with the remote. It takes a few seconds to get fired up and most of the time I can't actually tell if the TV has processed my pushing the ON button, I usually just turn it on manually.But given the price and how it works I'm very happy with my purchase. Don't expect top of the line performance from this TV, but knowing that I would definitely recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Two different TVs arrived broken
Reviews.Author: JJ "JJ"
Reviews.Content: Ordered first Coby, arrived broken with box smashed. The second TV also arrived broken with smashed box. Didn't get a chance to test drive the Coby.Amazon offered another compatible TV made by Septre.

Reviews.Title: audio trouble
Reviews.Author: shezsalady
Reviews.Content: already having audio problems. Tv keeps muting itself. Have turn it off then back on to get the sound back.

Reviews.Title: Got a bad deal
Reviews.Author: Kamar Richards
Reviews.Content: When I got the screen it had a small crack (1 inch) in the bottom center of the LCD so on powering up I saw it as it is very apparent when watching a show in white background. Looks refurbished so I dont know who to blame on that if its COBY USA and there quality or the vendor and its advertised state on purchase, Crappy speakers also I must say.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Taylor
Reviews.Content: This TV has poor picture quality and very poor sound quality. I would not recommend this TV. You definitely get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Coby TV
Reviews.Author: Aimee Zimmerman
Reviews.Content: This isn't the best tv we've ever purchased, but for the price we paid, and the fact that it's not our main tv, it's just fine.  The picture seems a tad bit grainy, and the sound isn't that great, plus if you need to go into the menu make sure you use your magnifying glass (ridiculously small menu, especially for a 39 inch tv- I'm guessing point 12 font).  If you're looking for a tv for any room in your house, this one will work.  If you're looking for one for your living/family room, you may want to consider paying a little more money for a better tv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for my 'needs'
Reviews.Author: Jacqulyn
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV a couple weeks ago, and so far, I have no real complaints. The stand was included, so I didn't need to make an additional purchase, and it was easy to set up. A lot of people have been complaining about the sound, but it's unclear exactly what they deem the issue to be; I think it's just fine, though I did play around with the treble a bit. If I were to make one complaint, it would be about the blue light on the front that is only lit when the TV is off: this TV is in my bedroom, and I typically like pitch-blackness as I try to sleep, but I just prop a DVD case over the light to 'fix' the situation. I don't have cable in that room, however, so I cannot judge the TV's capability to find all the channels properly, as seems to be a common issue with new TVs in general.Pros:- Easy set-up- Great picture- 3 HDMI ports (though I only use 1)- The price- Decent sound, in my opinionCons:- Blue indicator light on the front

Reviews.Title: A good price for this size TV
Reviews.Author: grant orman
Reviews.Content: Needed a TV that would fit my amoire.  Saw this and it was the right size and for only $249 figured can't go wrong.  First one arrived with a damaged screen.  Plugged it in and there was black spots on the bottom with multicolored lines coming off them vertically and horizontally.  Amazon got me a new one in only a day or 2.  This one works great and fits my amoire perfectly.  The picture on this screen is surprisingly good in hi-def  better than I figured it would be in fact at this price.  Sound is fine,  It's in my master bedroom not living room so I wasn't  concerned about having the best sound.  So 5 stars to amazon for great customer service and to Coby for this good deal.

Reviews.Title: Nice set for the price
Reviews.Author: Madipuppy
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice set at a great price. It plays as good as any other one out there. The only minor drawback and its pretty silly, is the bright blue light on/off indicator. It stays lighted and totally lights up my bedroom. I have to put something in front of it sometimes.

Reviews.Title: Unfortunate Experience Trying To Buy This TV
Reviews.Author: Uncle Mike J
Reviews.Content: I liked the deal, read the reviews, and decided this would be a nice TV to replace an old flat screen in my bedroom. So I pulled the trigger and the TV arrived on schedule two days later.As soon as I set it up and turned it on, I knew I was in trouble.  With only the setup menu on the screen, there was a wavy line going across the screen near the bottom.  There was also a red vertical line going right up the middle of the screen.  These lines did not go away when a regular TV picture was on the screen.I got on a chat with Amazon and they arranged to have a replacement TV air shipped for arrival the following day. In the meantime, I packed up the defective TV and handed it back to UPS.The second TV arrived the following day and I immediately set it up. This TV was in even worse shape than the first one.  There was gobblygook all over the bottom part of the screen and perhaps 10 colored vertical lines which all remained on the screen when I brought up a TV picture. I repeated the chat drill and Amazon was willing to send out yet another TV, but I declined.The first shipping carton had a hole in the top a few inches across, but the TV looked undamaged.  The carton containing the second TV looked perfect, as did the TV. There must be fundamental problem with either the shipping carton or the design of the TV itself that is causing this damage in the LCD screen, apparently in shipping.I was very disappointed, as the HD picture on the TV looked great. The second TV is on its' way back to Amazon and now I am trying to figure out a plan B.

Reviews.Title: Great deal! Big TV little price!!!!
Reviews.Author: Eric Branham
Reviews.Content: This TV is not the best out there, But for $249.00 who can complain. It does almost everything I want a TV to do. It has a good picture (you have to do some adjusting) but not bad. The only thing I wish it did, like a Philips TV and thats auto fill for screen size, but even most high end TV's don't have that. The remote isn't as bad as I thought it was going to be according to reviews. Sound is ok, if you want big sound GET A SOUND SYSTEM!!!! over all a great deal! 3 HDMI's good luck finding that on alot of TV's!!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: A. Paugh
Reviews.Content: We got this TV for our master bedroom.  It's a great quality TV for the price, great picture.  The only cons is that after you turn it off it tend to creak and crack, not sure why.  Also I had to tape up the blue LED on the front.  It seems backwards but when the TV is on the LED turns off, and when it's OFF the LED is on.  It makes it hard to sleep so I put a piece of electrical tape over it.

Reviews.Title: Sound is funny
Reviews.Author: Felipe Rivera
Reviews.Content: Since it is refurbished, I didn't expect it to be amazing. However there is a slightly annoying thing with the sound. When I first turn it on it sounds somewhat muffled. Either my ears adjust after awhile, or it corrects on its own, but I don't notice it after a minute or 2. A minor annoyance is all, otherwise it's fine and a great price.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Stephen Greenough
Reviews.Content: Fit for purpose.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price.
Reviews.Author: Mr. T
Reviews.Content: I purchase this Coby 39 inch TV to be installed on my patio I recently built. Picture looks great and I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Barely used and problems within a year
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: Volume button is stuck, can only watch TV at max volume....very disappointed!  Seemed like a great deal at the time

Reviews.Title: 39" Coby LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Tech-Knowledge-E Reviewer
Reviews.Content: I've used this product for almost a year and I haven't any complaints from the device nor any of the connections.

Reviews.Title: HDTV Colby
Reviews.Author: Charles J. Baeten
Reviews.Content: I had a tight cabinet I needed a flat screen TV to fit into to replace a tube job. my choices were limited. This one fit the bill. When I got it install I was so empressed with the picture and the price I bought another for my son's room. I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: broke after 6 months of light use
Reviews.Author: TFiori
Reviews.Content: Broke after 6 months of light use in our entertainment room. Would not power up but light would come on. Luckily I purchased the extended warranty through Amazon and they gave me a 100% refund no questions asked.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: loonytn
Reviews.Content: Very good TV.  Works fine and would recommend to anyone that is looking for an updated flat screen T V.

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware!!
Reviews.Author: Tray R Stephens
Reviews.Content: We ordered this television Thanksgiving 2012 and the picture went out this morning, 1 year and 1 week later.....  Will NEVER purchase another Coby product!!!  Buyer Beware!!!!  This television will not program to Direct TV....doesn't have the capability!!!!

Reviews.Title: terrible quality product
Reviews.Author: carlos restrepo
Reviews.Content: terrible product , bought it for my elder mom in florida and the  first time it came and was broken and did not turn on. terrible ordeal for an old lady to repack and send but  luckily amazon stood behind product and sent new one.  now i am searching for a set of boosting headphones to buy since the tv volume at the max level is barely audible .  too much hassle to return but i would stay away from this cheap TV .

Reviews.Title: Great tv at a fantastic price
Reviews.Author: mainer
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv and the price was fantastic. Bought it for my husband to have at camp as his eyesight is not as good as it once was and he could not read the on screen guide on the older tv.

Reviews.Title: Great tv good picture
Reviews.Author: jared
Reviews.Content: This tv is great. The picture is pretty good for being a coby tv. I have had it for almost a year now and it continues to work awesomely. The only slightly negative thing is it takes a few seconds longer than most tvs to turn on.

Reviews.Title: Didn't last 10 months
Reviews.Author: Karl Groves
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a Christmas present for my father. Title says it all. In addition to all of the other criticisms (such as crappy sound), this product did not even last 10 months.

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy this Crap
Reviews.Author: Jennifer L Groves
Reviews.Content: What a joke..  Bought it as a gift and did not last a year.  Don't waste your money..  Amazon you should not let them sell this since it is such a piece of crap!

Reviews.Title: It works OK
Reviews.Author: Harry "abidehandy"
Reviews.Content: I got this so I can do training in a large room, for my bike trainer and other workouts. It is pretty grainy when I used the old fashioned VHS tapes. Yes I still have some.Playing CD's also not very clear, but again, when I am moving around, who cares since I am more interested in following the instructions not in the fine picture. The price was right for the job.

Reviews.Title: DIDN'T LAST A YEAR!!!
Reviews.Author: Slammer
Reviews.Content: TV failed after 11 months and no warranty by the company.  I would not purchase this TV again or advise anyone to no matter the price.

Reviews.Title: Best TV purchase yet
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I've had no problem with this TV since buying it. Great picture, has enough inputs for my stuff and puts up with my excessive movie/TV watching habits.Only complaint is the audio. The built-in speakers aren't perfect, would definitely recommend buying separate speakers. I have an RCA RTS7110B and it works great,

Reviews.Title: Sound
Reviews.Author: Jeff Leese
Reviews.Content: Good picture quality for the price. However unless you're 5 ft away from the tv you cannot hear it even if its as loud as it can go.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for an even better price
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: This is a huge TV that usually would have been well beyond my price range. But I got it for a super deal and it works just great. Had some issues with the remote but I'm not too concerned about that. I was pleasantly surprised that the TV swings around on its base so it can be viewed at different angles with ease. Great buy in all! Can't beat the price for this product.

Reviews.Title: My first Coby
Reviews.Author: Sue C. Varty
Reviews.Content: I had never owned a Coby--in fact, I never had heard of it.  This TV fit my criteria, one of which was that it would not cost more than $250.00!  It didn't plus it was a 39" TV--I was looking at 32" TV;s.  I read the description of it and liked what it said so I bought it and I have never looked back!  It was everything they said and has given me great satisfaction.  I am delighted with it.

Reviews.Title: Crap!Crap! Crap!
Reviews.Author: Brian Spratley
Reviews.Content: The audio( almost impossible to turn up the volume enough to hear it at just 10ft away) and overall quality was on the lowest end of the scale. Very cheaply made. If you enjoy unpacking and repacking and returning things, then this is for you. Because you will have to do just that. Unpack it just to find out you are going to have to re-pack it and return it. DON'T try to get another one for replacement. If you do buy it, get your money back and buy one that is worth taking out of the box. You'll have a much better chance of getting something you won't have to return if you avoid this one.

Reviews.Title: The tv is just fine and a monster for the price but...
Reviews.Author: S. Borriello "Stef B."
Reviews.Content: The tv is just fine and a monster for the price but it came in the box without any screws or anything that was basically needed for it to stand up!.... Anyway.... the tv is really nice. Nice picture, the screen is phenomenal and the audio in spite of all the critics out here I say is quite good! At least in the surroundings of our apt...!

Reviews.Title: Not bad - not spectacular
Reviews.Author: Tom Buckler
Reviews.Content: I bought this set without ever seeing a Coby monitor in my life. Risk! My first one arrived damaged, not doubt by the delivery man. I wasn't impressed with the packaging from the factory though. The second one works just fine. Thanks to amazon I had no issues returning the defective unit or getting the new one. All headaches were UPS related. I've had it running for a little over 3 months now with no issues. I like the set a lot but I'm thinking it's a bit over priced currently.Sound:All sorts of awful. Too quiet for some sources. Always hallow, tinny and murky. No low end whatsoever. Hook up an amp and some speakers to this thing and go forth knowing you have done what needed to be done. A switched RCA out for audio would have made that simpler but then its less then 300 bucks. Digital out is good, but I'm pretty sure it will not output your analog audio sources should you have them. Never tried, but I don't think it has that kind of A to D conversion capability. If I was designing this TV I wouldn't put that in.Picture:Not bad. Blacks aren't super black and off angle (especially from above) is poor. What do you expect for 3 bills on a TFT? I own worse, but I also own better. This set will not knock you off your feet. For less then $300 it's a monster though. Which brings us to the next point.Value:It's $400ish right now. I'm sure you can do better if it's at the $400 price point. Coby has a LED 39" for about $320 on Amazon right now. Go shop around. $400 is at least a hundy too much for me! That's why it only gets 3 stars. If it was still sub 300 I'd give it 4.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Justin Michael Wells "Dirty Seagulls"
Reviews.Content: Really nice TV, but keep in mind you can NOT hook up any external audio to this baby. It is just flat out dumb of Coby to not have the correct hook ups for something so common. So no wireless headphones here guys!Nice Picture though.

Reviews.Title: It's good
Reviews.Author: jmscreator
Reviews.Content: The TV serves it's basis. I use it as a computer monitor, however, the tv remote just stopped working today... I figured out that there is something wrong with the tv and not the remote because the remote is sending out a signal.

Reviews.Title: Coby TV Doesnt Turn On.
Reviews.Author: Kelsey J King
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV and the blue light appears when you plug it in. but when you turn on the power it doesnt turn on. DO NOT BUY THIS TV! I have also read a bunch of comments and they have the same problem.

Reviews.Title: Worst tv/customer service EVER!
Reviews.Author: Catherine Theohary
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv as a gift for my mother on March 12, 2013.  It worked well for about three weeks, then the blue screen of death appeared with no sound.  Unfortunately this happened just outside of Amazon's 30 day return period, so she had to ship it back to the manufacturer and pay for the cost of shipping.  Now the tv has been with Coby for longer than she had it herself, and when she calls Coby, a random customer service rep tells her that they don't know where it is, the factory hasn't logged it in, and that they will get back to her.  She also called Amazon who told her that there was nothing they could do as it was outside of the 30 return policy window and the manufacturer's responsibility.  It's become a source of stress because she has no idea if and when they will send her a repair or replacement, and since she will be away for the summer -- unable to receive deliveries -- it may be returned to the sender, never to be seen again.  What was supposed to be a nice gift for my mom has turned into a huge hassle for her all around.  I wish I had bought her a more expensive tv so we wouldn't be going through this now.

Reviews.Title: Installed less than a month
Reviews.Author: thagrove
Reviews.Content: Doesn't turn on. Lights indicate power, no picture. I was hoping for a longer lasting solution. Next time we won't get the lowest priced option.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good
Reviews.Author: dc Nv
Reviews.Content: Great TV, especially for the price.  The one thing I would improve would be the volume.  It doesn't get loud enough, in some cases.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: James M Gordon
Reviews.Content: The first one showed up with a small crack in the screen and a 2 square inch area of solid white at the bottom of the screen. I submitted a request for a replacement, and received it less than a week later (before shipping the defective back), and it's been working fine ever since (3 months). Great picture, good sound. Excellent customer service.

Reviews.Title: good price decent
Reviews.Author: katherine c hackney
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat screen and it looks great. I don't have hd so I am sure that would be way better.But, what's up with the blinding blue light when the tv is off??

Reviews.Title: Hmmmm I guess it's ok
Reviews.Author: bob
Reviews.Content: It seems to be a good TV. My real problem was the first one sent, simply did not work. I went through all the work of mounting it and then it simply would not come on. Amazon made it very easy to return and I just ask for a one on one exchange. After going through the setup again, the replacement has worked fine,,,,,, but there's always that little nag in the back of your mind, " Is it going to come on when I push the power button?"

Reviews.Title: Best Bang for ya buck.
Reviews.Author: Rap expert "RG"
Reviews.Content: If your looking at tvs around 40 inches under $300. Buy this. Game set match. No problems with it at all.

Reviews.Title: This truly was a great DEAL!
Reviews.Author: brice shanks
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my daughter for Christmas and the price and quality are sensational. What a great find!

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: John Burch
Reviews.Content: TV is as advertised and works great, good picture and sound! For the money can't beat it. Very wet TV.

Reviews.Title: great picture! my kids love it
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: Havent had any problems, great picture, great sound. Easy hook up, Just a wonderful purchase!I am very pleasde :)

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: Karen Kuffel
Reviews.Content: Can't beat this TV for the low price.  My 14 year old son uses it mostly for gaming and movies and has no complaints.  He uses his Sony headset with it most of the time so not sure about the sound but you can't beat it for the money.

Reviews.Title: Sound is fine...Picture NOT so much
Reviews.Author: Esspy
Reviews.Content: Sound is exactly what a reasonable person should expect of of a flat screen TV and it is fine.  The picture is not very good.  It almost seems if they are lying about the number of pixels this has as a lot of the time the picture seems blotchy.  The TV cannot handle motion at all, so the best picture you're going to see is a still one.

Reviews.Title: Mediocre quality tv with bad customer service when you need it.
Reviews.Author: Firelock
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for a workout room. I don't need a great picture, or any bells and whistles, just the basics. Picture is typical for the price range.( poor) Very thick TV so not particularly good for wall mounting.  I knew I was taking a risk buying an off brand like Coby, but I at least expected it to work properly out of the box. I finally realized that the remote was bad, and only by removing the battery cover and pressing hard on the batteries would it work. Being a sealed remote, I can't take it apart and re-solder the connections. Not a big deal, I was able to get it to work well enough to use it to program a learning universal remote. Still, I paid for a working remote control, so I'd like one. Emailed Coby and told them the problem. They tell me to send them a money order and they'd send me a new remote! Huh? What about a warranty? That's their way of handling a problem on their part. Instead of owning up and taking care of the customer, they lose one forever. Typical mentality of these low end TV companies. I'd hate to think what they would do if the TV itself was defective. Buying this Coby is a crapshoot, but then its a $250 TV.

Reviews.Title: Bright clear 1080 HD
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: This was a bit of a surprise.  The color and detail is as good as many of the high-end units I have seen.  I use it both as a TV and a monitor for my computer.  There were ample cable connection choices to connect it to all of my AV equipment.  Several months of hours daily use and still going fine.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: First tv was broken, and two weeks later the second one shorted out, and volume is poor. Was more upset since it was a gift for my mom.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, good price, nothing really wrong with it
Reviews.Author: Chief Keef
Reviews.Content: It's not spectacular but there's nothing bad about it it works just fine and picture looks good.  Only reason it's a 4 is when I first got it the screen was broken but they sent me a new one.

Reviews.Title: Picture great, audio weak
Reviews.Author: Phillip Ernzen
Reviews.Content: Picture great, audio is weak as others have described, volume has to be near full. Any room noise and its hard to hear.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Terese Fields
Reviews.Content: Has many features , User-friendly , easy set-up, clear picture and durable.Sound could be better!!  Overall I am pleased.

Reviews.Title: so-so not clear
Reviews.Author: teresa hyman
Reviews.Content: Its not as clear as I thought it would be.I am not sure if I would buy one again. not sure

Reviews.Title: good buy!!!
Reviews.Author: tracy j thomas
Reviews.Content: i like tvs!!!! just like a 40'' good picture, great buy!!! Easy on the pockets!!!! my tv broke and i was shoping store to store, then i checked out the amazon on my phone!!! there it was, my deal waiting for me!!!

Reviews.Title: I like it!!
Reviews.Author: bella92037
Reviews.Content: I cannot give you guys a better review because I am not great with eletronics but I've got  what I expect!! The television works great!

Reviews.Title: Suprised me
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: Awesome tv for the price and size. I like how fast it was shipped too. It's a great tv for all my gaming.

Reviews.Title: typical tv
Reviews.Author: micah townsend
Reviews.Content: I havent had any problems with it but again it is nothing special. worth the price if you are interested.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Dusty
Reviews.Content: I can't believe how nice this is. Never had a flat screen before. Works great! I feel pretty good that I have decided on this one. Very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great T.V. and price!
Reviews.Author: RNV-AZ
Reviews.Content: The picture is great and i think the sound is good. For the price this t.v. is a great value.

Reviews.Title: good picture, bad audio
Reviews.Author: Micah D. Lamb "Micah"
Reviews.Content: Picture looks pretty good.  Sound quality doesn't seem very good though.  The main problem is its really quiet.  Even on max volume its not loud enough for normal watching.

Reviews.Title: Great Budget TV
Reviews.Author: Joshua C. Bock
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my bedroom. I hung it on the wall and have my pc connected via HDMI. Picture is great. Motion blur is minimal. Sound is average for  a tv of this size and price. The only con is the super bright LED that shines when the TV is powered down. If looking for a decent budget TV you can't go wrong. As far as the brand, this Coby TV has the same menu and remote codes as a Haier TV I bought a couple of years ago and have had great luck with.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for a bedroom, didnt expect much. like the other reviews said the sound isnt the best, but the picture is great. For the price you cant go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Channy
Reviews.Content: It's good item and reasonable prices.And I received it short enough in time.I hope all your business going well.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: VERONICA MCNEIL
Reviews.Content: The cost of product  was rated below the quality. Very pleased with product, I would recommend this item to others.

Reviews.Title: Great tv!
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Adams
Reviews.Content: I love this tv! I needed a bigger tv for the living rom area and found this one for a cheap price. I had my bad thoughts about a cheap tv but this right here.....this tv is great!

Reviews.Title: Best price on this size TV
Reviews.Author: Belinda Logan
Reviews.Content: This was truly the best price I could find on a 39" TV.  It was actually cheaper than smaller TVs of lesser quality.  I was afraid I might "get what I paid for," but it is really just as nice as any more pricey TV.  It is surprisingly lightweight.  It was very easy to install on the wall.  The picture is fantastic.  I am thrilled with this purchased.  For the record I paid $269.99.  I know prices change sometimes, but that was a VERY good buy according to my research.

Reviews.Title: Why not 5 stars?
Reviews.Author: ana
Reviews.Content: I think the complaints about the speakers are exaggerated.  Sure, they aren't as good as what manufacturers used to put in tv's, but they are a lot better than my 32 inch tv's speakers, and even the 55 inch tv I have.  The picture is great, and the price was incredible.  I just got it, but I'm really impressed with it, it was better than I anticipated.Update:  The only thing I don't like about this tv is the blue light that is on whenever the tv is on.  I have it in my bedroom which is fantastic, I don't have to strain my eyes to see it, but I hate to put a small piece of electrical tape over that blue light, it was so bright at night, it bothered me!

Reviews.Title: Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: michael duran
Reviews.Content: Good price. Could have better sound. Might have been disappointed if it was our main TV. Perfect bedroom TV. Good deal.

Reviews.Title: Excellent service and products
Reviews.Author: charlotte fitzgerald
Reviews.Content: The television is more than I had imagined. I had not ordered anything of this caliber on line before and was very happy with this product.  I am recommending it to my friends who are looking for a new t.v.  Also, it was delivered during the great blizzard we were experiencing at the time really living up to the two day delivery service.  Thanks again Amazon

Reviews.Title: Sound
Reviews.Author: Marquita Cottle
Reviews.Content: The sound on the tv leaves a lot to be desire. Most programs have to be watched with the sound all most all the way up to hear. The picture is good though.

Reviews.Title: coby tv
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This items frame rate is not that great. When to much is going on in a scene it will get blurry. Overall it is ok. But not great by any means.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Whitney
Reviews.Content: We bought this tv to replace our old one in our family room, and we totally love it!!!! The sound is decent and the picture is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Charles B. Moore "amberjackcj"
Reviews.Content: Great ProductGreat Product  Thanks and would buy againWill return for more merchandise I give it five stars definitely for sure

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: ryan haley
Reviews.Content: The product works perfectly, and it arrived promptly.  What can I say?  It was a great bargain and I am very satisfied with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great quality for the price
Reviews.Author: DogSoldier
Reviews.Content: Purchased this in December 2012 as a Christmas gift for my girlfriend. After a few months of use, Im able to say no regrets about this purchase. This was one of the lowest priced, best reviewed 39 inchers I could find. Picture quality is exceptional. Sound is lacking, but that being said, I havent really found any other flatscreens in this range with great sound, so I would say its pretty comparable in that area. I would definitely purchase again. Once you make the jump to 40 inches , the prices seem to go up significantly. 39 inches will give you a great size at a comfortable price. Oh, its pretty lightweight as well.

Reviews.Title: Money well spent...
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Davis
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a gift for my parents and they loved. Said it has a great picture... and I couldn't beat the price either!!

Reviews.Title: Crisp & Clear
Reviews.Author: Dennis M. Carr
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a bedroom TV for my brother & sister in law.  They needed to stay with us while we repaired thei home from Hurricaine Sandy.  They have been with us now for almost 4 months.  They have been very pleased with the quality.

Reviews.Title: HDMI to HTPC works great
Reviews.Author: anthony G Marlow III
Reviews.Content: for cheap set works great.  I have had it a year and everything works fine still.  HDMI through anything and picture looks great.  but my coaxial input looks a million times better on old ghetto tv than on this one. I have heard other complain of the same with most hdtvs though.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV.
Reviews.Author: Konnor Kessler "Spike Gondry"
Reviews.Content: Nice little TV good picture and colors, all in all good for the money, got this for my den and am happy with it, the picture is not the best but not the worst not bad for the price.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: Loren Honstead
Reviews.Content: I have only owned this product for a month.  Everything is doing well.  I really like the picture quality.Good value

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: havent had a single problem with this...sounds sucks but thats okay! good picture on my xbox hd looks good...if you have the money get something nicer..i only paid like 260$

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Randy Wilson
Reviews.Content: Great price. Got this quickly. I own a bar and got three of these and that all have excellent pictures.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Stephanie E. Ochoa
Reviews.Content: The TV is beautiful and has good picture quality. I would definitely recommend this item to any of my friends.

Reviews.Title: OMG
Reviews.Author: grock
Reviews.Content: I just got this tv yesterday and it is so mich nicer than I could have imagined!!  The picture is soooo clear and the color is crisp and clean.  I did not even have to make any adjustments to the color or brightness etc. Definate a good buy..and I looked around for awhile .

Reviews.Title: Great picture!  Sound not so good.
Reviews.Author: Kevin McCloskey
Reviews.Content: Great picture!  Sound not so good.  Its a solid 4-star choice.  And you can't beat the price.  I recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Finally a flat screen
Reviews.Author: Dejha
Reviews.Content: This TV works just fine. It is my first HDTV. An odd size but I like it! Totally bargain for the price. The RCA cord that came with it was faulty so when I first hooked my cable up there was a buzzing noise and the picture had lines going across the screen but I called Amazon and the lady who helped me trouble shoot got to the heart of the issue with great haste. A+

Reviews.Title: VERY PLEASED~
Reviews.Author: disapointed in Oregon
Reviews.Content: High quality. Delivered on ttime. Easy to attach and very very good picture quality. Very sattisfied with purchase. Would buy this brand again.

Reviews.Title: its OK, but good for the price.
Reviews.Author: TheComputerDewd
Reviews.Content: Made a good Christmas present.Pros :- Large screen- Good Pixel Density- 1080PCons :- Not very thin, but its whatever.- Color contrast changes alot from input, but in a way it kind of looks better at times, but at most it ruins the blacks and you loose alot of your image.If your planning on using a PC to connect to this, you can use HDMI or you can use VGA + It has a AUX Input for PCs.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Danny J
Reviews.Content: LOW COST HD TV. Best Deal I found on the internet. Sound is not the loudest but for the price its more than reasonable

Reviews.Title: Good enough
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Quite satisfied. The sound quality is not impressive, but it is adequate. The picture quality seems very good and the price was certainly right.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Herb
Reviews.Content: All things considered this TV was a great value.  Excellent picture, good features.  Only slight negative is the sound quality.  Certainly worth the $250.00.

Reviews.Title: lcd tv
Reviews.Author: DIANA WESTBROOK
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for a friend, he said it was good for the money, had a good picture, no problems.

Reviews.Title: Great TV & Great Price
Reviews.Author: Lauryn
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV as a gift for my mom for Christmas and she loved it. The picture and sound are great and I have not had any issues with it so far. As an added bonus the shipping was super fast (even though I chose the free super saver shipping)! I ordered this TV on December 18, 2012 at 6:30pm and it was delivered December 19, 2012 at 5pm.I know others have had issues but it has been terrific for us. If we experience any issues I will update this post.

Reviews.Title: Value for money
Reviews.Author: Shannon "CollegeGirl"
Reviews.Content: Paid $225+tax and can't complain about the features. Sitting next to Panasonic, can't tell the difference.It's been 3 months and no issue so far. My kids love playing PS3 and xbox games that requires HD capability.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: sunnydee522
Reviews.Content: This television is a great asset to my bedroom. The 39 inch screen is big enough that I can see it from every angle

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: elsie tarbell
Reviews.Content: The TV is great with the exception of the sound system which has a very hollow sound. It was a great value and I'm glad we bought it.

Reviews.Title: BAD
Reviews.Author: Margo
Reviews.Content: It was cheap and junky, reception was not up to standard. all info onscreen was very small, just not a good product  But then it was bargain priced....

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Christopher H
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my folks that wanted a new larger TV.  They had set aside $500 for the purchase and I soon discovered that all that amount did is get you into the "middle of the road" in the world of HDTV's.  So, since they'd never had a HDTV in the past, I decided that it was best to save them the money and get a "budget" TV since they wouldn't notice or miss features that they never had in the past anyway and I was right.Bottom line, regardless what you read about poor sound(which is fine for TV viewing by the way) and other things, if you are just looking to get a nice large HDTV than this'll be a good purchase for you.  This isn't meant to be the cornerstone of your home theatre system, it's meant for people that just want to watch TV and for that it's well suited.

Reviews.Title: christmas present for grandma
Reviews.Author: brandy dvorak
Reviews.Content: the tv was a christmas gift for my grandma, it arrived quickly and without a fuss. she was very surprised and loves to watch movies on the beautiful screen

Reviews.Title: Good for what I paid
Reviews.Author: Willie Sandoval
Reviews.Content: Sound: below avgQuality:-  below avg for watching TV,-  excellent for connecting my computer via VGA,-  terrible for connecting my computer via HDMIPrice:  EXCELLENT.  I only paid $250 plus tax.  That's great.I would recommend this television ONLY for anyone trying to use this as a computer screen using VGA, not HDMI.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the $$$
Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: So far I have no complaints for this television. Most complain about the sound but it's really not that bad. It's a flat screen & with that comes a smaller space for speakers. There are 3 HDMI inputs so a surround or sound bar is all you need to make that better. The tv itself actually has a great picture - which I was worried about since I was replacing an old Sony. I had to let go of my name brand shopping & price shop this time & to my surprise this tv was well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: No problems
Reviews.Author: Andrew Haldan Srb
Reviews.Content: It's a solid TV. Wasn't broken. It scared me when it took about 15 seconds to turn on, but then it was fine. Menus are tiny. I haven't tested the speakers and probably won't because I have a system.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture but appalling audio quality
Reviews.Author: SZ
Reviews.Content: Had this TV for almost a month and it's been great!  Very happy with the video quality.  The audio quality, however, is absolutely terrible.  The televisions speakers lack decent bass and sound very hollow.  When watching movies, the audio quality can often become unbearable.  Seriously, the speakers on my MacBook are better than the ones in this TV.  Picture quality is the most important thing to me so the poor audio does not make me regret the purchase.  I recommend this television just as long as you have a way to play audio through a sound system or pair of external speakers.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the price
Reviews.Author: T. Lilly
Reviews.Content: The high definition quality is outstanding for the money. Just like everyone else says, you will need a speaker system. The volume is very low without one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent so far
Reviews.Author: Evelyn Prioleau
Reviews.Content: This TV is working excellent so far.  This it a good value for the price.  I am enjoying my new tv.

Reviews.Title: For the price an excellent bargain
Reviews.Author: John R. Fawcett
Reviews.Content: I purchased this set as a Christmas gift for my wife. Therefore, we've using it for just a week. Can't give five stars until we've had it for six months, but so far the picture is true hd. The colors are rendered very well,  and the sound is not bad. Set up was easy and the price at $250 for a 39' tv is a deal.

Reviews.Title: coby 39-inch tv
Reviews.Author: Mj33
Reviews.Content: This is good for its price. The picture is good, the onlything that's bad about this tv is the volume is kind of low but it easy to live with.

Reviews.Title: Coby LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Lillie Lockwood
Reviews.Content: Completely unsatisfactory.  Would not run and had to be returned.  I would not order another Coby  TFV3925 39 inch 1080p 60hz LCD HDTV (Black). I am now skeptical of any product by this manufactory.  I really do not hate it, I do not know anything about it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Liz Miller
Reviews.Content: Love this tv.  My daughter has it also, which is why I looked for the best deal.  No one has come close to the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: perfect for me.
Reviews.Author: taylor
Reviews.Content: It was perfect for what i wanted.in my opinion,everythig is great..but i agree with previous comments that sometimes you dont know if it turns on or not the first time.

Reviews.Title: Cool TV
Reviews.Author: Nicole Femdman
Reviews.Content: only thing missing is PIP,good quality ,very lite,good price,is great  for watching tv and use the pc. excellent ... get it

Reviews.Title: It is worth what you pay for and then some
Reviews.Author: antonio b
Reviews.Content: Im very impressed with the unit. It is an exceptional value. The resolution and adjustment capabilities are great. It'ss only flaw is the unidimensional sound quality , but for basic viewing it is great!

Reviews.Title: Great image!
Reviews.Author: MTMeg5
Reviews.Content: Image is very excellent! I have read several reviews stating that the sound quality is not very good, but our dental office just uses it to post images up from a camera during appointments, so sound was not an issue for us. Perfect for what we use it for!

Reviews.Title: Coby TV
Reviews.Author: Brenda smith
Reviews.Content: It is a good TV and at a good price. The pricture shows very well. I recommend it to anyone looking for a good reasonable TV.

Reviews.Title: Returning Item
Reviews.Author: Patricia Whitfield
Reviews.Content: The product was defective .  After checking with tech supprt it was deteremined to be defective so I am returning the item.

Reviews.Title: It was a gift
Reviews.Author: Jill plain
Reviews.Content: I dont have alot to comment as this was given as a gift, but the set up was early andthe item itself has a very nice picture.

Reviews.Title: Surprised
Reviews.Author: JB3
Reviews.Content: I was very surprised by the quality of this tv for the price. The picture quality is great compared to my Samsung. The negative is the sound. The sound is very poor so we purchased a sound bar which fixed the problem..The Tv also arrived 3 days early. Great deal for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Eva Schlabach
Reviews.Content: This is a serious "bang for your buck".  We are very happy with this tv. The sound is a little quiet but not a problem with surround sound.

Reviews.Title: Alright for price
Reviews.Author: Special J
Reviews.Content: Slow transitioning between inputs. Large screen but sometimes have a hard time believing its 1080p while watching hd... Speakers are not good so plan on at least having a couple speakers at the ready

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price!
Reviews.Author: Penstah "Best Boston Computer IT Consultant"
Reviews.Content: Wasn't expecting much for this price, but was amazed at the picture quality! The sound as the other reviews say , is bad but isn't horrible for  a small room!

Reviews.Title: Great bargain!
Reviews.Author: Michael Kleinknecht
Reviews.Content: I love this TV ..especially for the price... Excellent picture... I have absolutely no complaints! Got the item at the end of November and it has been nothing short of high quality!

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Jaclyn Rachel Ford
Reviews.Content: Great quality for the price.  Good picture, easy to set up. The maximum sound level isn't very high, but that's my only complaint.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: codeman
Reviews.Content: the sound isn't high quality stereo sound or anything but, if you got your own sound system problem solved. But all in all I was satisfied with this product the picture is very nice and it doubles as your PC monitor also has 3 HDMI Connections plus all the other connections aswell.

Reviews.Title: perfect gift
Reviews.Author: Marbriez
Reviews.Content: i'm using this a tv/monitor for a teen's room. i don't like the fact it doesn't audio output but it does the job

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Value for the Price...
Reviews.Author: Jamie Ratliff
Reviews.Content: I bought this Coby LCD HDTV at a great price, and while it's not the best HDTV on the market, you really can't beat the value of a 39" lcd hdtv for under $300. If you are looking for a tv for the kids room or guest room that has a nice picture and decent sound, this hdtv will work great for that. If you are looking for a high end hdtv for the living room, this set won't be the one, and you simply can't find on anywhere near this price range. For what you pay for this tv, it is an outstanding value.

Reviews.Title: nice tv
Reviews.Author: Shirley DeVore
Reviews.Content: the price was right as I walked down the street one day the price was still right on the tv.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Read
Reviews.Content: The TV came in good order.  it is beautiful. The picture is very good. It was also very easy to install.

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: Shopping Girl
Reviews.Content: We got this for our sons game room, it great for what we use it for. They haven't actually watched tv on it yet, but it's great for gaming.

Reviews.Title: Coby TV
Reviews.Author: laurie masingill
Reviews.Content: TV is terrific.  Only complaint is that blue power light is bright when TV is turned off.  Used in a bedroom and have to cover the light at night.

Reviews.Title: Great so far
Reviews.Author: Denise
Reviews.Content: Bought as a Christmas gift and the receiver is very happy with it. It came quickly and is huge for the price. He is using it mostly for gaming and has hooked his computer to it to and loves it so far.

Reviews.Title: flat screen tv
Reviews.Author: Vickie Peyton
Reviews.Content: We ordered it on Black Friday and we expected to receive it in 7 working days and we received it the following Monday. We were very surprised. We have enjoyed it. Black Friday price without the crowd. Great quality too. We are very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Poor, poor sound quality!
Reviews.Author: shirleyshirley
Reviews.Content: I agree with most of the reviews.  The picture is good but the sound quality is inferior - sounds like a tin can.  But like others have said you do get what you pay for.  I will probably hook another sound system to it.  Overall a good tv for the price just don't expect good sound.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV
Reviews.Author: Tammy
Reviews.Content: It is a very nice tv , we've had it for about a month now ... the color is a little 'bright' , but over all , it was a great tv for a exceptional price on this size  ... it is great having a tv this big in the bedroom..

Reviews.Title: Coby 39" tv
Reviews.Author: Dean
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv when it was on sale an it works great only thing is the sound could be a lil better. Great Christmas present to myself.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Jocelyne Hogan
Reviews.Content: It was fast delivry, it works fantastic, a real steal for the price, I would recommend this TV to my friends, hope to enjoy it for years to come

Reviews.Title: Damaged TV
Reviews.Author: Jordan
Reviews.Content: The TV was in great condition when I received it. When i plugged it in, I noticed that parts of the screen would fade in and out. Once I hooked up the cable box, I noticed that the TV was half picture and half vertical parallel lines. Worst TV ever.

Reviews.Title: Coby TV
Reviews.Author: Dione L. Schumann "Dee"
Reviews.Content: When we received the TV, the power cord on the back was loose and the frame is cracked, the box from UPS was in perfect condition, not sure when the damage happened.

Reviews.Title: As expected
Reviews.Author: Frederick Campbell
Reviews.Content: worked as expected the rest are just words that I am required to write in order to submit this email

Reviews.Title: Good choice
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: For being my very first TV purchase, I think it was a decent choice. I'm very satisfied. The price was decent as well.

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: mohan zaver
Reviews.Content: beter than heider tv . very good result , easy to installation and programming. good resolution compairing with price than other tv i had from other store.

Reviews.Title: colby tv
Reviews.Author: rick
Reviews.Content: the tv does everything i wanted it to do. the picture and volume are good. I would recommend the tv

Reviews.Title: At least the picture is good
Reviews.Author: Dan Jarvis
Reviews.Content: Well it worked out of the box and the picture quality seems fine, but the sound is terrible and it takes too long to turn on or off or even to change channels.  The price was good, but sometimes you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Not the best
Reviews.Author: Richard Ferrari
Reviews.Content: I bought a Coby sound bar to hook up to my new Coby TV because the sound was not as good of a quality as I hoped. I thought it would be easier to stay with the same brand. I hooked up the sound bar using the Coaxial cable that came with the sound bar. I could not get any sound. I hooked the sound bar up to my dish box with the 2 audio cables and it worked fine. I emailed coby technical support twice for advice on how to hook up to the TV directly and never got a response. I do not know if the sound bar was defective through the coaxial cable. I tried different settings on the TV menu screen with no results.

Reviews.Title: Fair price. Quality product
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I paid 300 dollars and I'm not regretting it at all. Although the stock sound is filled with static.  A Home theatre system will remedy that

Reviews.Title: coby tv
Reviews.Author: Tom Rogozinski
Reviews.Content: good picture when using hdmi cord with high definition box. Great price for the size of the screen and being 1080.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Careful buyer
Reviews.Content: If you don't want all the bells and whistles on a TV, then this TV will be okay to purchase. It does the job!

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV
Reviews.Author: Isaac O. Farua
Reviews.Content: I receive this TV in a good condition.Everything in it is okay by my friend that I bought it for. The sound is okay.Isaac FaruaSt John'sAntigua & Barbuda

Reviews.Title: Good Deal...Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Levesque
Reviews.Content: TV was a great size for the kids.  Wall mounted effortlessly & works perfectly for what we were looking for!

Reviews.Title: its good for price
Reviews.Author: Charles B
Reviews.Content: For the price well worth. The screen has flickered on me a couple times so it makes me worried. Wait and see

Reviews.Title: Excellant
Reviews.Author: John Slaughter
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, great picture quality, great price! Arrived imeadiately. Very pleased with product and service.I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: An Excellent Value, but Don't Expect a Premium Experience
Reviews.Author: D. Buxman "A Seeker of Truth"
Reviews.Content: At a price of around $260, this is an excellent television with a good picture and easy set up.  As other reviewers have said, the sound quality isn't great and there are some issues with viewing angles, but it makes an excellent office television/computer monitor.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: keith w
Reviews.Content: Great TV got it as a present for myself for chirtmas.  playing my ps3 on it great picture and looks good with the hi def in puts

Reviews.Title: Works fine so far
Reviews.Author: ray
Reviews.Content: purchased end of November and the Picture and sound is good so far.Nice TV for the price.good buy.

Reviews.Title: Yes, Sound Does Suck. First Shipment Was Broken!
Reviews.Author: PhoenixOnPoint
Reviews.Content: I was highly annoyed to find that the very first TV I received was broken.  I went through the trouble of unpacking it, setting up all the connections, etc.; then when I turned it facing forward and removed the final thin sheet of foam from the screen and turned it on ... there were spider webs and a glow. It was a pain to repack, deal with Amazon customer support in another country (bad phone connection), then wait another two days for another TV to come.  Shipping was already delayed due to the holiday.On the second TV, the sound seems not as good as the first for whatever reason, unless I just don't remember correctly, so I'm unsure if I got a somewhat faulty unit.  Not returning this one.  In any event, the sound DOES SUCK -- all the reviews are correct.I expected the sound to be subpar when I purchased this, so I'm not very surprised. However, I thought the other reviewers were just being too critical/picky, or expected movie theater quality sound. I thought, "Surely it can't be that bad."It is.I'm definitely getting a surround sound system when I can afford it.  Admittedly, I'm a bit spoiled, having moved from a Toshiba rear projection with amazing surround sound simulation and theater quality sound. However, the sound is tinny on this TV, as others have said.  Imagine listening to a movie through those old-school foam-covered personal headphones that you used to use with a Walkman. Now imagine if you're sitting next to someone blasting music through their Walkman speakers. THAT is how this TV sounds -- like you're that "external listener," getting a taste of someone else's music from a few seats away.I tried using one speaker more than the others, as suggested as a "fix" by one online reviewer for this TV, but didn't notice any improvement at all.  I've played with all the sound settings available, using the preset ones (Theater, News, Standard, etc.), then trying a "Custom" combo of my own -- sound still wack.How's the picture? I can't comment on its potential there, as I don't have HD cable nor an HD or Blueray DVD player. Is the sound wackness enough to leave this TV on its virtual shelf?  Negative. I got this for a very good deal near Black Friday 2012 ($240) to replace our 46" living room TV that died. This TV would be better in a bedroom or smaller room, but I think it's worth the purchase. Just prepare to eventually channel the sound to a more capable system.

Reviews.Title: @$249 It can't be beat!
Reviews.Author: Simon Clement
Reviews.Content: I bought this HDTV for my home office. It's purpose is to run in the background for music, sports, news while I am working online. So frankly I don't care if it's not 5.1 Surround Sound, I don't care that it's not a super speedy refresh rate. I do however like the fact that it has 3 HDMI inputs. I put a ROKU on this TV for now and the two work great together.It's light weight and easy to move around. I did have to run out and by some M6 metrics screws for my wall mount application (didn't come with the HDTV).In the end, this is an easy and inexpensive solution to my desire to have Video/Audio in my home office. And unlike some others, it worked on the 2nd and 3rd day of ownership too :)

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Sleddog21
Reviews.Content: Awesome TV. This was a replacement to a failed projector setup and i am blown away. Huge tv for 250 bucks. The other reviews are right, the sound is crap, but if you don't mind it its ok. Also there are no RCA audio outs so it gets hard to hook up a stereo to it. It does have a digital audio out but I'm not sure how to use it, it wont work with a normal stereo. But the screen is pretty and huge for 250. The colors do get a little offset if you look at if from a pretty wide angle, but the base swivels a little so that gets rid of that problem. Also the colors can be a little off depending on what i have hooked up but you can adjust them.Because of the bad sound/lack of audio out and the RARE times the image is a little off, i give it 4 stars. Other than that, 5 out of 5!!!! I would defiantly recommend to anyone looking for a cheap but decent big screen TV.

Reviews.Title: How can you go wrong for the price
Reviews.Author: Tammy L. O'Dell
Reviews.Content: This is a product that will fill the need at a low price. thats it. no extras. for the money it's what you should expect.

Reviews.Title: Coby TV
Reviews.Author: Jonathan R Brown
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my bedroom.  It was the perfect size, and it this tv has great sound and picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture and price. Low sound.
Reviews.Author: K. Bergen
Reviews.Content: I rated 4 stars because of the sound. It has very poor sound but would be a great TV when used with a sound system. The picture is excellent and the price is fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Great tv! great price
Reviews.Author: Betsy Sayre
Reviews.Content: Very please with everything!! Pictures great, sounds great! all around awesome tv. was a early christmas gift very happy with everything it has to offer.

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: julie arment
Reviews.Content: it has a great picture, was easy to set up (even tho it was too large for entertainment center).we just set it on top! looks great!! i feel like i got a good deal with it.

Reviews.Title: Quality TV
Reviews.Author: Nik
Reviews.Content: I'm very Happy with my Coby 39 inch LCD.  There are other reviews in this section that indicate the audio on this model is poor.  Those reviews are accurate, however that is the only complaint I have.  The audio is the only thing stopping me from giving it a 5 out of 5.  That can be easily fixed with a cheaper surround sound set.  The picture is fantasic!!  Great TV for the price

Reviews.Title: Okay TV, if you don't mind the crappy sound.
Reviews.Author: C.Reyyy
Reviews.Content: It's a 39", which is pretty big. The screen is very sharp, so no worries there. Visually, this TV is great.However, the sound is awful. I'm pretty forgiving, but I instantly noticed how bad the sound is. Sounds EXTREMELY tinny / treble-y. I saw another review online that described the speakers as "tin cans" and that about sums it up.Furthermore, and the DEATH KNELL for this TV-- there is NO AUDIO OUT, whatsoever! Which means, if you want to hook up any kind of better speaker system to it (which I definitely did)-- YOU CAN'T.No headphone jack, no red/white audio out (i thought there was, but there isn't). So yeah, you're pretty much stuck with the crappy tin can speakers.If you don't mind very sub-par sound, you could live with this TV. But I need the AUDIO to match the PICTURE. This TV sadly fell very short of that.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Kevin Dykstra
Reviews.Content: Overall, I was completely satisfied with this tv. As a college age student, it was definitely a good buy for the $250 I payed for it. I have seen TVs with better picture quality, but really this TV is not bad quality. If you are looking for the best picture quality, I may not suggest this TV. But for anyone looking to afford a relatively cheap TV of this size, this is the TV for you. Quality picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: This TV for the price is really a great deal.
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: This TV for the price is really a great deal.It has a good picture and all the features you really need....nothing more and nothing less. Did I mention the great price?

Reviews.Title: Great deal for the price!
Reviews.Author: Lauren
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV because our old one died completely. This was the best deal that I could find for the size and price. Picture quality is great and overall we are very happy with the unit. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because of the  sound. It's okay but the TV has some cheaper speakers in the back of the unit which therefore makes it a little flat and tinny sounding. We might end up hooking some speakers up to it though which should take care of that slight minus.If you don't have a lot to spend but want a larger screen for your money, buy this tv! It's a great value and we will be keeping ours around.

Reviews.Title: Great Televisions
Reviews.Author: William Devaux
Reviews.Content: I am using both the tv's as monitors for my living room entertainment computer. They are bright clear and the resolution is awesome

Reviews.Title: Do not purchase, I would rate 0 if I could
Reviews.Author: Maurice Johnson
Reviews.Content: I have bought countless items on Amazon and understand sometimes items have to be returned for various reasons. This Coby TV was the worst purchase I have ever made on Amazon. The first TV about 1/5 of the screen would show. The replacement was worse it did not come on at all. As usual Amazon took very good care of me with both returns. My mom was coming in town and I wanted her to have a flat panel in the spare room. I ended up purchasing a Seiki from a store because I did not have anymore time to spare after waiting on two deliveries. Do not buy this item. I would rate 0 stars if i could.

Reviews.Title: nice tv
Reviews.Author: Ms.Kay
Reviews.Content: Thought I would take a chance on this purchase and definitely happy. I learnt along time ago name brands are not everything and this tv is the proof.

Reviews.Title: Television
Reviews.Author: Terran Roundtree
Reviews.Content: This televisions picture quality was not of good quality. The buttons on this television did not work on the television nor did they work on remote.

Reviews.Title: Screen goes Black after 60 seconds, sending it back
Reviews.Author: Charlie Tuna
