Reviews.Content: I just got this TV. When I turn it on the screen goes blank after about a minute, but the audio continues to work.  I called Coby and they said it has a defective board and needs to be returned to Amazon or I can call their repair center to have it replaced.  It's Made in China.  I'm shipping it back to Amazon!Seems like a nice TV when it works, and the sound is fine for an average viewer like me.UPDATE:  We received a replacement in one day. However the screen was cracked.  We're done with this model and have requested a refund.I wasted 2-3 hours of my time.

Reviews.Title: WASTE OF MONEY
Reviews.Author: Kerie Fowler
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this product.  You get what pay for and this is a cheap piece of crap. I could live with the subpar sound, and the cheap look of it, what I cannot live with is the fact that the HDMI ports do not work correctly.  At first the tv would take anywhere from 2-10 minutes to register the fact that my bluray player was on.  It would simply display "no signal' during that time no matter which port (of three) that I plugged it in to. Eventually, within less than a month of use, it stopped registering altogether. NO SIGNAL NO SIGNAL NO SIGNAL. It's too late to return and I'm stuck with a tv that cannot be used with any external device, as I have no cable/tv service, it might as well be a paperweight.

Reviews.Title: very good for my needs
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: the TV fits almost anywhere and is easy to lift, the graphics are sufficient for my needs. My only complaint is that the closer you get to the screen, the more pix-elated it becomes, but over all it works grate!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME TV
Reviews.Author: LINDA HOLLINS
Reviews.Content: First of all i have to give a "SPECIAL SHOUT  OUT TO UPS IN" BIG D"DALLAS,TEXAS.For making a SECOND ATTEMPT TO DELIVER MY COBY TV.I really appreciate your commitment to your job.Second i would like to thank everyone at AMAZON.COM for your expert TIME IN DELIVERY of my product.This tv is "SUPERB".I LOVE IT.It fix's perfect in my bedroom.It is everything that was described in my order.The color is GREAT.The sound is GREAT.I cannot EXPRESS ENOUGH HOW APPRECIATED BOTH YOURSELF  AND UPS IS APPRECIATED.THANKS FROM THE BOTTOM OF MY HEART.

Reviews.Title: Good Product, I'm satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly D. Green
Reviews.Content: This was a great buy! I had a $100 gift card to Amazon so I only had to pay less than $200 for it and it turned out to be a great tv. I'd recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Received broken
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Flimsy trim bezel around tv!  Received tv and bezel was cracked....returned tv and replacement tv was cracked in opposite corner....Amazon service on delivery and returns was excellent but disappointed with the quality of the tv...

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Vedderhead
Reviews.Content: Got this for a vacation home, didnt expect much. This TV has exceeded all expectations. I will be buying more.

Reviews.Title: I purchased a Coby 39-inch LCD HDTV from Amazon
Reviews.Author: NatLee
Reviews.Content: The TV was received in a timely matter.  The packaging was intact.  The TV has a beautiful picture, however, the sound was so low and it was not able to be adjusted.  We had to purchase a sound system to hook up to the TV and now it's great.  Had I known, I would have paid more for better quality.

Reviews.Title: wow great for the price
Reviews.Author: Mikial Kenneth Millard "Mikial Kenneth Millard"
Reviews.Content: This tv is great for the price they charge. The screen is very clear, option menus are simple and the hd quality is very good with amazon instant video hd and xbox 360. The only slight negative is that the sound isnt high quality but the sound is not bad either . Great tv.

Reviews.Title: GOOD TV FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: guadalupe avalos
Reviews.Content: CANT BEAT THE TV FOR THE PRICE, VERRY HAPPY WITH MINE .I USE IT AS MY PC MONITER ALSO USING THE AVG CONECTION,ITS DECENT...

Reviews.Title: Coby TFTV3925
Reviews.Author: Jeri L. Magoon
Reviews.Content: The TV was great.  However, right out of the box the remote didn't work.  Called for a new remote.  They needed all the information that was on the TV that we had already mounted to the wall.  What a problem!!!  Then, had to wait for the remote.  My dh took the old remote apart and the circuit boards were all bent up.  No wonder it didnt' work.  ANd it was shipped that way.

Reviews.Title: Broken
Reviews.Author: Pete Fraunhofer
Reviews.Content: I guess it's a little harsh rating this 1 star because I never got to turn it on.  It arrived with a cracked screen.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: Ed Rossi
Reviews.Content: great tv for the money, would tell anyone to buy this tv, makes a great gift for framily and friends.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLY DISAPPOINTED!!!! Biggest Mistake Ordering This!!
Reviews.Author: Heidi L. Zbel
Reviews.Content: I had purchased this COBY 39-Inch TV for my 8 year old son as a gift for Christmas. Needless to say, that we had set all of the equipment up as per the instructions. When we turned the TV on, all it did was BLINK ON AND OFF, over and over! We are very disppointed in this product and my son was quite upset. Customer service was called to see if anythging could be done and the end result is it has to be returned. I will be expecting a full refund and I will be going to the actual store to purchase a new TV for my son. I have never ever had a bad experience ordering online until now, especially through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Well priced, Standard HD Qualitly.. buttttt
Reviews.Author: rc
Reviews.Content: THE SOUND SUCKS. Ladies, and Gents, if you dont mind purchasing a sound bar r hooking this up to a home theatre system, then you musta) live with this TERRIBLE Mono sound qualitlyorb) Return it.Tust me on this guys, this is a wonderful television, but the sound qualitly will KILL you if ur using this television for Netflix, or for your cable service provider.  But if you dont care bout superior sound, or if your getting it for your 7 year old's playstation, then buy this machine

Reviews.Title: Awful Product
Reviews.Author: Pluff Mud
Reviews.Content: Gave this to mom for Christmas.  Sound is terrible.  Good picture but barely audible beyond 10 ft of the tv.  Amazon was great in taking it back and resending another assuring it was defective.  After receiving the secong one the issue is just that Coby is an awful manufacturer of poor quality products.  Will never purchase another Coby product and will do anything I can to deter anyone from ever giving them another penny.

Reviews.Title: Not good for gaming.
Reviews.Author: JAT
Reviews.Content: This Tv is not good for gaming. I tried playing my xbox 360 on it and the display horrible, pixilated.

Reviews.Title: WHAT I THINK ABOUT THIS PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: kim caudle
Reviews.Content: BECAUSE  IT DONT SHOW CLEAR PITCHER AS I EXPECTED AN THE VOLUME IS NO LOUD ENOUGH  WILL NOT ORDER AGAIN.

Reviews.Title: Took a chance and got burned!
Reviews.Author: Marie
Reviews.Content: You would think shipping a TV via UPS or Fedex across the country that you would take a little extra care in packaging the item. NOPE!!!!! Item delivered, of course with a big dent in box and when I powered up the TV it had a "black hole" in screen. Sending it back and going to best buy like I should have in the first place.

Reviews.Title: Damaged
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was expecting to receive a good deal with this product since it got very good reviews on Amazon. Also the price was unheard of anywhere in the internet. However, I couldn't be more wrong. When I had finished setting up the TV with my PC (I bought it to use as a monitor), I found out that the screen was damaged. It had a long crack  on the bottom of  the LCD. 'Okay'... I thought. I could return it and get a new one. But then, I started to verify the quality of the image. Well,I wasn't happy at all. The picture looked snowy and had several diagonal lines running across the screen. I  had already tested my other TV (Sceptre) with my PC and the  quality picture was phenomenal. My PC has a very good graphics card, which helps. But with this Tv the image quality is terrible. So I decided to return it to Amazon and order another brand.

Reviews.Title: I really do hate it!!
Reviews.Author: ishan sameera
Reviews.Content: I bought this few bays before. But from the begining it did switched on but no picture and switched off instantly, and i had really bad time with this TV. Coby should think about their TV production and amazon should think about selling this product.

Reviews.Title: I bet its a good TV
Reviews.Author: Jake benson
Reviews.Content: I got this TV a week ago from today. It had flickering issues, and I was in the market for a more stable image. I bet this is actually a good tv if you find one that works, and I bet one that works is good enough for a 5 star rating, which is why I gave it one. Oh also, the website advertises two composite inputs for video games and it only had one.

Reviews.Title: BROKEN LED
Reviews.Author: dk
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived in a timely manner and was all excited to check out the featured. When plugged in, realized that the LED inside was damaged. Only saw a cracked display.
